guideline_ids.description: Unique guideline ID or IDs that were violated.

memory_ids.description: Unique memory ID or IDs that were violated.

is_generic.description: True if the comment is a general suggestion not tied to a specific guideline or memory.

confidence_score.description: A float betwee 0 and 1 indicating how likely it is that the comment is a false-positive because it is highly subjective. 0 means very likely to be a false positive. 1 means not at all likely to be a false positive.

bad_code.description: must always cite the SINGLE matching APIView line, stopping at newlines. OMIT the line number. NEVER concatenate multiple lines.

suggestion.description: only the single replacement code line exactly as it should appear (no markdown fencing, no prose), or the literal JSON null if thereâ€™s no fix.

comment.description: concise, human-readable description of the issue. DO NOT use code snippets. DO NOT cite line numbers or guideline IDs.
